ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ شَٰهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: O Prophet! We have sent you as a witness, and a bringer of good news and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Prophet, We have sent you as a witness and a bearer of happy tidings and an admonisher,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O Prophet, We have sent you forth as a witness, a bearer of good tidings, and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Prophet, We have sent you as a witness, a bearer of glad news, a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O Herald of the Hidden! We have indeed sent you as an observing present witness and a Herald of glad tidings and warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O Prophet! Verily, We have sent you as witness, and a bearer of glad tidings, and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O Prophet! surely We have sent you as a witness, and as a bearer of good news and as a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O Prophet, We have sent thee as a witness, and good tidings to bear and warning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O Prophet! Lo! We have sent thee as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O Prophet, We have sent forth you as a witness, as a bearer of good news and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Prophet! verily We have sent thee a witness and a bearer of glad tidings and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O Prophet! Indeed We have sent you as a witness, as a bearer of good news and as a warner
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O Prophet! Truly We have sent thee as a Witness, a Bearer of Glad Tidings, and Warner,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O Prophet (MuhammadSAW)! Verily, We have sent you as witness, and a bearer of glad tidings, and a warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O Prophet, We have sent you as a witness, a bearer of glad tidings, and to bear warning;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O prophet! We have sent you as a witness, and a bearer of good news, and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O Prophet, indeed We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:45] O Prophet! Indeed We have sent you as a witness, against those to whom you have were sent, and as a bearer of good tidings, for those who affirm your sincerity, of Paradise, and as a warner, for those who deny you, of the [punishment of the] Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (O Prophet!) He means Muhammad (pbuh) (Lo! We have sent thee as a witness) that you have conveyed the message to your nation (and a bringer of good tidings) i.e. Paradise to whoever believes in Allah (and a warner) against the Fire for those who disbelieve in Him.
